name: HOUSELINK JSC
description:
HOUSELINK started with a simple idea: linking investors with construction supply chain to create values together
Technology is a powerful tool making your network stronger and more effective to do business and we also believe that amazing things can happen by just connecting the reliable members to each other. That is the reason why we created HOUSELINK - a platform for construction professionals, bringing project owners, contractors and suppliers together in a uniquely visual community. We link project owners with architects/ engineers, general contractors, sub-contractors and manufacturers/ suppliers together to identify the best opportunities from suitable people, partners, products and projects, basing on the same platform like a house, to expand and develop business easily, effectively and sustainably; while contributing to create a better and more transparent society.
